alert.note: Alert for Inland Citrus (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:21PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Citrus County through 100 PM EDT... At 1221 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Inverness Highlands North, or near Inverness. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Beverly Hills, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Inverness Airport, Black Diamond, Hernando, Arbor Lakes, Inverness Highlands, River Lakes Manor, Citrus Springs, Withlapopka Isle, Pine Ridge, Citrus Hills, Gospel Island, Brent Wood, Citronelle, Lecanto and Floral City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
